mapper.select: SELECT count(1) as count FROM wlsms_machine_new where wx_name = #{wxName} and car_pol = #{carPol} and dpl_value = #{dplValue} and tkpl_value = #{tkplValue} and xh_type = #{xhType} and msl_value = #{mslValue} and zzb_value = #{zzbValue} and tzys_name = #{tzysName} and bm_type = #{bmType} and ml_name = #{mlName} and muladdr = #{muladdr} and others = #{others} and exmlen = #{exmlen} and fcycle = #{fcycle} and flen = #{flen} and cf = #{cf} and rm = #{rm} and sindex = #{sindex} and user_properties = #{userProperties} and appear_time = #{appearTime} and build_type = #{buildType}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO wlsms_manual_new ( wx_name, car_pol, dpl_value, tkpl_value, xh_type, msl_value, zzb_value, tzys_name, bm_type, ml_name, muladdr, others, exmlen, fcycle, flen, cf, rm, sindex, user_properties, build_date, position_code, pro_code, user_no, build_type, create_time, edit_time ) VALUES
( #{item.wxName}, #{item.carPol}, #{item.dplValue}, #{item.tkplValue}, #{item.xhType}, #{item.mslValue}, #{item.zzbValue}, #{item.tzysName}, #{item.bmType}, #{item.mlName}, #{item.muladdr}, #{item.others}, #{item.exmlen}, #{item.fcycle}, #{item.flen}, #{item.cf}, #{item.rm}, #{item.sindex}, #{item.userProperties}, #{item.buildDate}, #{item.positionCode}, #{item.proCode}, #{item.userNo}, #{item.buildType}, now(), now() )

INSERT INTO wlsms_machine_new ( wx_name, car_pol, dpl_value, tkpl_value, xh_type, msl_value, zzb_value, tzys_name, bm_type, ml_name, muladdr, others, exmlen, fcycle, flen, cf, rm, sindex, user_properties, appear_time, build_time, position_code, pro_code, user_no, build_type, create_time, edit_time ) VALUES
( #{item.wxName}, #{item.carPol}, #{item.dplValue}, #{item.tkplValue}, #{item.xhType}, #{item.mslValue}, #{item.zzbValue}, #{item.tzysName}, #{item.bmType}, #{item.mlName}, #{item.muladdr}, #{item.others}, #{item.exmlen}, #{item.fcycle}, #{item.flen}, #{item.cf}, #{item.rm}, #{item.sindex}, #{item.userProperties}, #{item.appearTime}, #{item.buildTime}, #{item.positionCode}, #{item.proCode}, #{item.userNo}, #{item.buildType}, now(), now() )
mapper.select:
SELECT id, wx_name, car_pol, dpl_value, tkpl_value, xh_type, msl_value, DATE_FORMAT(build_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as buildDate, zzb_value, tzys_name, bm_type, ml_name, muladdr, others, exmlen, fcycle, flen, cf, rm, sindex, user_properties, position_code, pro_code, user_no, build_type FROM wlsms_manual_new where 1=1
and (sxzfq_name like concat('%',#{queryBt},'%') or system_name like concat('%',#{queryBt},'%') or pro_code like concat('%',#{queryBt},'%'))
and DATE_FORMAT(build_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(build_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and pro_code = #{proCodeManual}
order by id desc

SELECT id, wx_name, car_pol, dpl_value, tkpl_value, xh_type, msl_value, DATE_FORMAT(build_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as buildTime, zzb_value, tzys_name, bm_type, ml_name, muladdr, others, exmlen, fcycle, flen, cf, rm, sindex, user_properties, appear_time, position_code, pro_code, user_no, build_type FROM wlsms_machine_new where 1=1
and (wx_name like concat('%',#{queryBt},'%') or tzys_name like concat('%',#{queryBt},'%') or pro_code like concat('%',#{queryBt},'%'))
and DATE_FORMAT(build_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(build_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and pro_code = #{proCodeMachine}
order by id desc
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO wlsms_manual_new
wx_name, car_pol, dpl_value, tkpl_value, xh_type, msl_value, zzb_value, tzys_name, bm_type, ml_name, muladdr, others, exmlen, fcycle, flen, cf, rm, sindex, user_properties, build_date, position_code, pro_code, user_no, build_type, create_time, edit_time,
#{wxName}, #{carPol}, #{dplValue}, #{tkplValue}, #{xhType}, #{mslValue}, #{zzbValue}, #{tzysName}, #{bmType}, #{mlName}, #{muladdr}, #{others}, #{exmlen}, #{fcycle}, #{flen}, #{cf}, #{rm}, #{sindex}, #{userProperties}, #{buildDate}, #{positionCode}, #{proCode}, #{userNo}, #{buildType}, now(), now()
mapper.select: select DATE_FORMAT(build_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as buildDate from wlsms_manual_new where 1=1 group by build_date order by build_date desc limit 0,1

select id, wx_name, car_pol, dpl_value, tkpl_value, xh_type, msl_value, DATE_FORMAT(build_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as buildDate, zzb_value, tzys_name, bm_type, ml_name, muladdr, others, exmlen, fcycle, flen, cf, rm, sindex, user_properties, position_code, pro_code, user_no FROM wlsms_manual_new where 1=1 and DATE_FORMAT(build_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{buildDate},'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT id, wx_name, car_pol, dpl_value, tkpl_value, xh_type, msl_value, DATE_FORMAT(build_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as buildTime, zzb_value, tzys_name, bm_type, ml_name, muladdr, others, exmlen, fcycle, flen, cf, rm, sindex, user_properties, appear_time, position_code, pro_code, user_no FROM wlsms_machine_new where 1=1 and DATE_FORMAT(build_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') = DATE_FORMAT(#{buildTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')

select id, DATE_FORMAT(build_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as buildDate, DATE_FORMAT(build_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as buildTime, remark, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as createTime, DATE_FORMAT(edit_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as editTime from wlsms_auto_build where id = #{id}

SELECT id, wx_name as wxName, car_pol as carPol, dpl_value as dplValue, tkpl_value as tkplValue, xh_type as xhType, msl_value as mslValue, zzb_value as zzbValue, tzys_name as tzysName, bm_type as bmType, ml_name as mlName, muladdr, others, exmlen, fcycle, flen, cf, rm, sindex, user_properties as userProperties, appear_time as appearTime, position_code as positionCode, pro_code as proCode, user_no as userNo, build_type as buildType, title_os as titleOs, DATE_FORMAT(build_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as buildDate, DATE_FORMAT(build_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as buildTime, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as createTime, DATE_FORMAT(edit_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as editTime from wlsms_data_new where 1=1 and DATE_FORMAT(build_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{buildDate},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(build_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') = DATE_FORMAT(#{buildTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') order by build_time desc
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO wlsms_data_new ( wx_name, car_pol, dpl_value, tkpl_value, xh_type, msl_value, zzb_value, tzys_name, bm_type, ml_name, muladdr, others, exmlen, fcycle, flen, cf, rm, sindex, user_properties, build_date, build_time, position_code, pro_code, user_no, build_type, create_time, edit_time ) VALUES
( #{item.wxName}, #{item.carPol}, #{item.dplValue}, #{item.tkplValue}, #{item.xhType}, #{item.mslValue}, #{item.zzbValue}, #{item.tzysName}, #{item.bmType}, #{item.mlName}, #{item.muladdr}, #{item.others}, #{item.exmlen}, #{item.fcycle}, #{item.flen}, #{item.cf}, #{item.rm}, #{item.sindex}, #{item.userProperties}, #{item.buildDate}, #{item.buildTime}, #{item.positionCode}, #{item.proCode}, 'admin', #{item.buildType}, now(), now() )
mapper.delete: delete from wlsms_data_new where DATE_FORMAT(build_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{buildDate},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(build_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') = DATE_FORMAT(#{buildTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
